create_db module¶

create_db.create_database()¶

Create the database needed for the project. Insert dataset CelebA from : <insert url ?>

Take¶

pathstr

Path of the downloaded dataset.

datasetnumpy.array

Contain the metadatas of the dataset

returns:

cursor – Cursor for communicating with the database

rtype:

database.cursor

create_db.create_meta_table(cursor, metadata)¶

Create the table of metadata in the database

Take¶

cursordatabase.cursor

Cursor for the database

pathstr

Path of the downloaded dataset.

create_db.get_database_cursor()¶

Create the database’s cursor

Returns:

  • cursor (database.cursor) – Cursor for communicating with the database

  • connect (database.connector) – Connector of the database

create_db.get_database_path()¶

As pathway are different in each computer, compute actual pathway to store data in a known path

Returns:

path – Path of the dataset download.

Return type:

str

create_db.img_name_to_path(path, name)¶

Convert image name into image path to display

Returns:

path – Path of the image.

Return type:

str

create_db.insert_data(cursor, connect, dataset)¶

Insert data in the table

Take¶

cursordatabase.cursor

Cursor for the database

datasetnumpy.array

Contain thevalue of metadatas of the dataset

create_db.metadata_pull()¶

Get the metadata’s name for creating the table in the database

Take¶

pathstr

Path of the downloaded dataset.

returns:

  • metadata (list) – List of the header’s name of the metadata.

  • data (numpy array) – Array of metadata value for each image.

create_db.print_database()¶

Debug function see what is inside database

Returns:

path – Path of the image.

Return type:

str

create_db.request_data_by_id(numbers)¶

Made a request that pull numbers id asked

Take¶

numbersint, list, tuple or 1D array

id’s image of database to pull

returns:

querry – filename of the selected id number

rtype:

str, list of str

create_db.request_data_by_metadata(array)¶

Made a request that pull numbers id asked

Take¶

array1D array

metadata array of 0 and 1

pathstr

path of metadata

returns:

querry – filename of possible img according to metadata gave

rtype:

str, list of str
